date: Tue Feb 08 2022 03:33:02 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: The photo shows all the students with masks -- but not Abrams. Her campaign said she was indeed wearing a mask most of the day, but later removed it so the children could hear her. The photo managed to draw the criticism of Republican incumbent Gov. Brian Kemp, who called Abrams a hypocrite about the issue. The governor's position on mask mandates has been to simply leave the decision up to individual school districts.
metaDescription: AI generated image about conservatives slamming Stacey Abrams for posing maskless in a recent photo during a visit to an elementary school goes viral.

Georgia Democrat Stacey Abrams is the latest politician to land in hot water over a maskless photo.
